title: Conflict
creator_credit: Halina Sztynda, Melanie Guiney and Dept of Conservation, Forests and Land
brief_description: Presents the views of the Forest Commission, loggers and conservationists in regard to logging practices in East Gippsland. Allows the viewer to draw conclusions about the attitudes and prejudices of the conservationists and the loggers and saw millers.
